title: "Test: Editor Options"
format: html
engine: knitr
filters:
  - webr
---

Check that the editor responses correctly to options being set. 

## Adaptive Container Constraints 

### Single line

```{webr-r}
print("test")
```

### Uncapped height

```{webr-r}
print("test")
59120
1 + 1
c(1, 3, 4)
print("line 5")
```

### Height cap

```{webr-r}
#| editor-max-height: 80
print("test")
59120
1 + 1
c(1, 3, 4)
print("line 5")
```

## Autosuggetions

Opt-in to auto suggestions.

```{webr-r}
#| editor-quick-suggestions: true
my_long_variable = 1

prin
```
